title: Low priority queue
body: I was playing a fun game of league but my family forced me to go to the store and now i'm in low priority queue please help.

replies.body: Does having LPQ on your history affect your end-of-season rewards at all?
Leaving a game for any reason still leaves your team to try and win without a full team. This is the main reason we have LPQ's.
LPQ occurs from leaving multiple games.
